title: Aegis
occurrences: Aegis - the mythical shield of the Greek god, Zeus.
A ship armed with the Aegis system is the ultimate defensive weapon.
Then Aegis will be nothing more than a shield for a lost nation.
...is equipped with an advanced Aegis defense system.
Aegis includes a powerful 360-degree radar array...
The Aegis system can track and attack dozens of targets simultaneously.
...titled "The Shield of Aegis" in its entirety.
No missile or fighter can penetrate an Aegis ship's defenses.
